summary: This document contains detailed information from the New York State Sex Offender Registry regarding Jeffrey Epstein, including his personal details, addresses, vehicles, and communication methods. It outlines his registration as a sex offender, including conviction details and notifications sent to various law enforcement agencies. This document contains a series of notifications and records related to Jeffrey Epstein's status as a registered sex offender in the Virgin Islands. It details various notifications sent to Epstein and the Virgin Islands Department of Justice regarding changes in his registration status, annual verifications, and photo submissions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is registered as a sex offender with multiple addresses across the Virgin Islands, France, Florida, New York, and New Mexico.
He has a history of convictions for sexual offenses against minors, with specific details of victims aged 14 and 16.
The document includes various email addresses and communication methods associated with Epstein.
Epstein's vehicles include multiple Cadillac Escalades and Chevrolet Suburbans registered in different states.
Notifications regarding Epstein's status as a sex offender have been sent to law enforcement agencies in multiple jurisdictions.
The document includes multiple notifications sent to Jeffrey E Epstein regarding his sex offender registration.
Notifications include annual verification requests and photo submission reminders.
The Virgin Islands Department of Justice is the recipient of many of these notifications.
The document outlines Epstein's address in St Thomas, VI, as part of the sex offender registry.
There are numerous mentions of the same addresses indicating ongoing communication regarding Epstein's registration status.
